players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out today."
You: "That's a lie, Charlie. I'm the detective and I investigated you last night - you're the mafioso. Diana, don't believe him."
Diana: "I need to hear more from both of you before deciding. Charlie, why did you investigate Bob? Bob, why did you investigate Charlie?"
Diana: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob first instead of a more suspicious target? Bob, same question for you investigating Charlie."

Charlie: "I investigated Bob because he seemed evasive in pre-game chat. Bob, if you're the detective, why didn't you share your 'findings' immediately at day start instead of waiting to counter-claim me?"

You: "I investigated Charlie first because he was acting suspiciously from the start. Diana, think about it - if Charlie were really detective, why would he immediately reveal his role and target on day one? That's exactly what mafia would want to do to frame an innocent."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
